p: Siparuna echinata is a native shrub of the Andean region, widespread from Colombia to Bolivia. It is known with the synonyms of Citrosma apicifera Tul., Citrosma buddleiifolia Benth., Citrosma echinata Kunth, Siparuna apicifera (Tul.) A. DC., Siparuna buddleiifolia (Benth.) A. DC., Siparuna holtonii A. DC., Siparuna killipii Perkins, Siparuna olivaceo-velutina Sleumer, Siparuna phaneroneura Standl., and Siparuna valenzuelae Cuatrec [ 18, 19].
